title: [The Long Snow, Expanse]
description: A small hillock rises to the south, breaching out of an otherwise featureless expanse of white snow and dark sky.  Fireglow flickers at the summit, a lonesome beacon amid the oppressive gloom and bitter cold.  In the darkness, the sounds of barking sled dogs and muted chatter from up above travel strangely, carrying for unusual distances as hollow echoes.
